original_text: It is he that sitteth upon the circle of the earth, and the inhabitants thereof are as grasshoppers; that stretcheth out the heavens as a curtain, and spreadeth them out as a tent to dwell in:
korean_text: 그는 둥근 땅 위에 앉으시나니 땅에 사는 사람들은 메뚜기 같으니라 그가 하늘을 차일 같이 펴셨으며 거주할 천막 같이 치셨고

sentences.original_text: It is he that sitteth upon the circle of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 땅의 원 위에 앉으신 분이시며

sentences.original_text: and the inhabitants thereof are as grasshoppers
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에 거하는 자들은 메뚜기 같으며

sentences.original_text: that stretcheth out the heavens as a curtain
and spreadeth them out as a tent to dwell in
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 거할 장막 같이 치시는 이시라
